actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The sorrowsworn makes two Arm Spike attacks.

actions.name: Arm Spike
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Embrace {@recharge 4}
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 25 (4d10 + 3 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition frightened}, and it takes 27 (6d8 damage) psychic damage at the end of each of its turns. The sorrowsworn can grapple only one creature at a time.
